  I'm a developer of my company's test framework. Recently, i'm so inte=
rested in the usage of @DataPoint and @Theory.

ramework can handle each compatible @DataPoint for the @Theory test as the =
independent test to run. I hope everyone of this kind test can generate the=
ir own "Assertion Success" or "Assertion Fail".
